response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering the high quality and unique features of this product, I'm offering it to you for $10,000. This price reflects the balance between its worth and my desire to make it accessible to someone who appreciates it as much as you do. I look forward to your consideration. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 10000}
